English: I'm back here again... This year, too...
I know this won't bring back any of my memories back, but...
Aren't you Frey, the one who people call the Priestess of Light?
Grand Elidoran Sage, greetings from the servant of Lua.
Hahaha, I am well, thanks to you.
You've already grown into a young lady... you were only a small baby when I first met you.
A baby? How did you..
Didn't Iris tell you?
I am the one who first found you under this World Tree.
Really..? all I was told was that I was found under the World Tree..
It's odd that Iris didn't tell you anything. I can still remember that day like it was yesterday.
It was an exceptionally warm midwinter day.
I was walking around the World Tree early in the morning.
And... there you were, an angel glowing in gold.
An angel?
An angel indeed! I saw the roots of the World Tree shining with holy light.
I went straight to it, and there was an adorable baby shining in gold.
I thought the baby was an angel, but I could see no wings.
The aura around the baby was not an ordinary one.
I then reached out to Iris in a hurry.
I heard that you were brought to the orphanage that the captain of the Holy Knights was running.
Yes. I was raised by my grandpa Ricardo.
Clause and Kasel were with me as well.
But... how come Priestess Iris didn't tell me anything about it?
There must be a reason.
All that Iris does is done under Lua's guidance.
I see... Thank you. That was the story that I wanted to hear the most.
It's the least I could do. I am afraid that I might have confused you on your important day.
May the light fill... Ah, I believe that humans say it differently.
Happy birthday, Frey.
Thank you...
I don't mean to complain.
But... who am I, Lua...?
...I'm back again.
Will I be able to meet you again...?
I will find you, no matter how much you have changed.
...Roi, you're still good at covering up your traces.
But you won't be able to fool me.
Why did you leave, Roi...?
You left without a single word...
A few years ago
*Huff, huff* They just won't give up!
Kuh...!
*Groan*
How's the wound?
...It's just a scratch.
Just wipe off the blood with this.
Do you think I like helping you?
Remember, we're in a joint operation.
A loss of a team member can compromise the entire mission.
Hmph, don't get all bossy here.
I did most of the work to earn us our name.
Everyone knows that you're a great assassin.
Things go wrong sometimes. Just like today.
Stop the bleeding and leave. I'll cover up the traces.
That's an order.
You're not going to stop mentioning that you're the boss, huh?
And I don't need your handkerchief. Take it back.
Then, just throw it away when you get back.
And get some rest. It's your birthday.
...How did you?
Why is this memory coming back...?
This weird feeling that I've been getting recently...
It's all because of you, Roi!
Same thing, different day, huh?
Tell me about it. It's his…
It's his birthday after all.
I heard birthday is a special day.
Isn't everyone supposed to celebrate?
Umm... We are, but I'm afraid
Loman might not like us making a big deal about it.
Come on, he's a brusque fellow, but I doubt he'll say no to a birthday celebration.
Last time, I wanted to buy a present for the princess and asked him for a discount.
He wouldn't even listen to me. He told me I shouldn't mix business with pleasure.
Umm... I think he was right on that one...
I was short on money, so I asked him one more time a bit aggressively.
Then, he raised his spear at me. Loman and I fought till it became dark. It was really fun.
...Loman might have his faults, but you're just as bad as he is.
Alright! Loman is a comrade in arms. I'm going to go start the celebration.
Wait!!
Um? Aren't you that (poor) entourage of Her Highness Princess?
Loman! Happy Birthda...
Are you out of your mind? Her Highness has left the castle! What are you doing here?
Don't you know it's dangerous out there?
(A while later)
I couldn't even finish my first sentence. He told me off...
*Sigh* We told you so.
You guys seem to know nothing about Loman.
He likes everything to be done by the book!
Just don't give him a reason to pick on you! Let me handle this.
Hey, Loman! How's everything?
Oh, Clause! Long time, no see. What are you...?
Ah! I've just wiped out some demons in the forest.
I've done my duty for today!
Good to hear that. My shift is almost over as well.
Oh? Then, shall we go to Juno's and have a drink?
It's your birthday, too! You're off tomorrow, aren't you?
It's quite surprising that you remember my birthday.
Haha, thank you!
Of course I do! Drinks are on me today. Pack your stuff!
I will, but in 3 minutes and 30 seconds.
No, I should add 5 more minutes to make up for the time we talked.
Yeah? I'll wait outside, then. Come out when you're ready.
What are you doing? Let's go, guys!
Whoa... Just like that?
There was a reason people spoke so highly of him.
Welcome to May's... Oh, my!
It's Lady Aisha!!!!!!!!!
Were you able to prepare what I asked you?
Sure, I did! Just as you ordered!
My lady, you could have just told me if you needed anything.
No! Don't do anything today, Priscilla!
No questions. Just listen to me!
Don't worry, we'll start easy!
What is going on...?
Tada! How do you like it, my lady?
Hmm... The main color doesn't really go well with her eyes.
Then, what about this exotic one?
What continent is this from...? Haha...
It's a little too soon, but what about this fancy swimsuit?
A little too soon? It's winter now!
Hahaha...
I saved the best one for the last. How do you like this?
Wow! Priscilla, you look gorgeous!
This! Let's get this! What do you think?
My lady, wouldn't fancy clothes keep me from...
Hey, didn't I tell you? No questions!
Hmm, I thought I could ask my lady for a favor for my birthday...
Huh? I-I mean... The clothes are your birthday gift!
Do you not like it...?
I sure do. This is the prettiest dress I've ever worn in my life.
But clothes like this can get in the way when I have to protect you.
I'm not saying you have to wear it all the time!
You can wear it for our tea breaks. Please?
You're always so good to me, Priscilla. I wanted to give you something, too.
Ha ha, you give me more than you have to, my lady.
Huh? What did I give you?
Every moment I am with you is a gift.
So, this fancy dress can wait until some other time.
*Sigh* Okay, okay. If you say so.
I'm sorry, May. We'll come back. Let's go, Priscilla!
Yes, my lady. How about afternoon tea with that rose-scented blend from the East?
Yeah! I love the tea that you brew!
And Happy Birthday, Priscilla!
Thank you, my lady!
I'm here, too, you know...
But you're our loyal customer!
Happy birthday! Please come again!
Hey! Any luck?
No, nothing yet.
I swear I saw her coming down this way.
Let's look around a little bit more!
Phew, they're gone, finally!
Since when did I start hiding on my birthday...?
Ah, yes. It all started that day...
Three years ago
Hmm?
Attention!
It's Captain's birthday today! Let's celebrate together!
Happy birthday, ma'am!
Congratulations, ma'am!
It's Captain's birthday! Gather up and celebrate!
Congratulations, ma'am!
Happy birthday, ma'am!
Hahaha... Thank you all.
We knew you'd like it, ma'am.
You'll never feel lonely on your birthday, ma'am. We'll all celebrate your birthday every year.
Happy birthday, Captain!
Haha... Thank you.
I should have known these guys would let things get out of hand...
It's just a birthday, not a national holiday or something...
Found her! Captain's here!
Princess! Clause! Loman! We've spotted Captain!
Urgh!
There you are, Demia.
Happy birthday. The entire nation is lucky to have you.
You're very generous with your compliments, Your Highness.
There you were, Captain! We were looking everywhere for you.
Let's begin Captain's birthday celebration!
Gather around!
Hahaha... Thank you, all.
It seems I'm stuck here... again...
